name: 凌凱
objective: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
schedule:
Week 1: Interviewing new students, review of last semester's contents, weekend activities
Week 2: Lesson 7 - Auxiliary verb "können"
Week 3: Lesson 7 - Auxiliary verb "wollen"
Week 4: Lesson 7 - Introduction new grammar: Perfekt, dictation
Week 5: Lesson 7 - Practicing Perfekt, typical sounds&expressions
Week 6: Lesson 7 - Review and test
Week 7: Lesson 8 - Jobs and occupations
Week 8: Lesson 8 - Introduction new grammar: Dativ
Week 9: Lesson 8 - Introducing new grammar: Präteritum (verbs haben/sein)
Week 10: Lesson 8 - Talking about the past
Week 11: Lesson 8 - Internship, unusual jobs
Week 12: Lesson 8 - Review and test
Week 13: Lesson 9 - In a foreign city, auxiliary verb "muessen"
Week 14: Lesson 9 - Introducing new grammar: Imperativ
Week 15: Lesson 9 - Auxiliary verb "duerfen"
Week 16: Lesson 9 - Reading brochures, at the hotel reception
Week 17: Lesson 9 - Review and test
Week 18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Class participation: 10%
Assignments: 10%
Tests after each lesson: 30%
Final exam: 50%
materials: As a textbook we use "Schritte International 1 & 2". It is a good choice for teaching German because of its systematic training of the four different skills: reading, listening, speaking, and writing. Included are a workbook and three audio CDs.
